testCaseName: Login and Verify Upcoming Anniversaries on Buzz
description: Registered user logs into OrangeHRM with valid credentials, navigates to the Buzz page, verifies the 'Upcoming Anniversaries' panel is displayed, and captures the list of people with upcoming anniversaries.

expectedValidation: Username and Password fields are visible

steps.target: Username input field on login page
Password input field on login page
expectedValidation: Password field accepts input and is masked
User is redirected to the Dashboard
Left navigation/menu is visible and contains a 'Buzz' menu item

steps.target: Buzz menu item in the left navigation
'Upcoming Anniversaries' panel on the Buzz page
expectedValidation: 'Upcoming Anniversaries' panel is present and visible

steps.target: Names/items listed under the 'Upcoming Anniversaries' panel
expectedValidation: All displayed names in the 'Upcoming Anniversaries' panel are captured
Names are printed/logged in the test report or console
If no names are present, log 'No upcoming anniversaries'
